title: september 15: the day the Supreme Court got its first woman justice
description:
Can you believe that America’s first woman justice wasn’t appointed until 1981? In today’s episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia breaks out the history books and does a deep dive into the life and career of Supreme Court Justice Sandra Day O’Connor. And while girl power is something we can all get behind, we’ll also be reminded of a day in more recent history surrounded by controversy in the music community...no shade to any U2 fans in the house! Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms. Distributed by Talkhouse.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
